title: VfL Wolfsburg - Wikipedia
snippet: On 24 May 2022, Niko Kovaƒç was appointed as Wolfsburg's new head coach, with a contract lasting until June 2025, prematurely terminated in March 2024. Wolfsburg plays at the Volkswagen Arena, a multi-purpose stadium which seats a total capacity of 30,000 spectators.

title: Daniel Bauer becomes forty-first head coach in VfL Wolfsburg history - Yahoo Sports
snippet: Daniel Bauer is now the forty-first head coach in the history of VfL Wolfsburg, signing a contract with the Niedersachsen club until 30 June 2027.The club officially announced that the 43-year-old sig...

title: Official | Wolfsburg appoint Daniel Bauer permanent head coach - Get German Football News
snippet: VfL Wolfsburg have confirmed interim head coach Daniel Bauer's permanent appointment.

title: Wolfsburg name Daniel Bauer permanent head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Daniel Bauer has been name full-time head coach of Wolfsburg.

title: Daniel Bauer becomes forty-first head coach in VfL Wolfsburg history
snippet: Daniel Bauer is now the forty-first head coach in the history of VfL Wolfsburg, signing a contract with the Niedersachsen club until 30 June 2027.
